ovdesc.p: System-generated generic work-file used in the production of some of the Wealth Management Reporting enquiries.
This table is used to capture the output of NOFILE routines as used by some of the WR enquiries so that the enquiries can be used to produce XML output.

The table contains two types of record - header and detail. Header and Detail record both contain the enquiry selection criteria as input and a sequence number. For the detail record, this is the row number as returned from the NOFILE routine. For the header record, it is the total number of rows returned.
Detail records also contain the data elements as returned from the NOFILE routines, held against fields F.001 to F.n where n is the number of data elements used.

desc.p: data row - element 76 (see enquiry for details)

data row - element 91 (see enquiry for details)
Record key.
For header records, this takes the format:
enquiryId * userId
For detail records, this takes the format:
enquiryId * userId * sequence
where the enquiryId is the id of the originating enquiry record, the userId is the T24 user, and the sequence is the row number as returned from the NOFILE enquiry - see 'Seq' for more information.

For a detail record, this is the row number of the array returned from the NOFILE routine that this record represents.
For a header record, this is the total number of rows that were returned within the array from the NOFILE routine.
